initial_question.title: Docs for adding mixed charts - Line and Bar
initial_question.body:
I'm unable to find out the docs in version 2 of Charts.js. 
Any idea how to go about adding mixed charts ?  ( A line and bar graph in the same chart)

satisfaction_conditions: Chart displays both line and bar visualizations simultaneously
All specified chart types render correctly
Chart type configuration is properly recognized by Charts.js v2
Dataset configurations maintain independent chart types
